pages.about.paragraph1: A fun and addictive game where the player must fight and kill a dragon in a battle to the death.
pages.about.paragraph2: The game was developed exclusively for learning purposes, using angular and ngrx for state management.
pages.about.paragraph3: If you have any suggestions or improvements to the game, just drop me a line and i'll get back to you.
